_sText: This is my latest map. :D It takes place in a underground mining facility named BIRO. Story: A group of angry miners have gone on strike in the BIRO mines. The owners of the mine refused to meet the miner's demands. So the angry miners have then hostage four top executives of the mine and are threatening to kill them. A group of elite Counter Terrorists have arrived at the entrance of the mine. The miners heard of their arrival and are now barricaded in section A-13 of the mine. One of the largest facilities in the mine. ________ CREDITS: Illkid (models) Tree models by unknown (please email me if you know who made them. killerworm@sbcglobal.net) Postal 2 (music) I hope you all enjoy it! -KillerWorm
